DOC.brief_summary: Phase IV , observational , post-authorization , cross sectional , open-label , multicenter study evaluate acceptability oral solution levetiracetam patient partial epilepsy assess questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Cross Sectional Study Evaluate Acceptability Oral Solution Levetiracetam
DOC.criteria: Patients 16 year old old diagnose partial epilepsy without generalization receive levetiracetam oral solution least 28 day study Patients disturbances sense taste smell interfere assessment parameter study
